abstract: Greenhill reported a 4 percent drop in advisory revenue last year, a week after larger rivals JPMorgan and Morgan Stanley posted much larger declines. It’s a good sign for smaller shops if they can handle a weaker market as well as a strong one.
snippet: Greenhill reported a 4 percent drop in advisory revenue last year, a week after larger rivals JPMorgan and Morgan Stanley posted much larger declines. It’s a good sign for smaller shops if they can handle a weaker market as well as a strong one.
lead_paragraph: If Greenhill’s results are anything to go by, M.&A. boutiques should have a certain degree of staying power.

headline.main: Greenhill Results a Positive Omen for M.&A. Boutiques
